name: Smart Girl: Christmas
description:
Smart Girl: Christmas' is a game of looking for portraits of cute Christmas girls.
It is a game to improve memory. It is easy and simple, but it can also fail.

Replay method: Remember 6 to 11 numbers in a limited time and enter a memorable number.

key usage:

0-9, , Esc, Back Space

function:

  • Improve memory
  • Women of various styles
  • 12 Girl's photographs
  • Comfortable Christmas music
